description.translate: The desire of one is not enough for the peace of a world to endure.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5L'échec d'Agart\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Il ne suffit pas qu'au désir d'un seul\"}","{\"text\":\"§7pour que perdure la paix d'un monde.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The desire of one is not enough for\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the peace of a world to endure.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7速度§a2 §7抗§a1 §7運§a1 §7力量§c-1\"}"]}}
